sources.title: The Ware Case
sources.description: A financier is accused of murder when his brother-in-law is found dead in his garden pond. After winning the court case he returns home to find that his lawyer has romantic inclinations towards his wife.

metadata.Plot: A financier is accused of murder when his brother-in-law is found dead in his garden pond. After winning the court case he returns home to find that his lawyer has romantic inclinations towards his wife.
metadata.Writer: Roland Pertwee, Robert Stevenson, George Pleydell Bancroft
metadata.Actors: Clive Brook, Jane Baxter, Barry K. Barnes
